Your task is to write a brief, fluent, and coherent single-paragraph product description in natural language. The text should be balanced and neutral. Make sure that all the facts mentioned in the text can be derived from the input data, do *not* add any extra information.
generated.out: The iQOO 12 Pro is a high-end smartphone that boasts impressive specifications. It runs on Android 14 with Funtouch 14 or OriginOS 4, depending on the region, and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. The device features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a resolution of 1440 x 3200 pixels and a 144Hz refresh rate. The triple rear camera setup includes a 50-megapixel primary sensor, a 64-megapixel periscope telephoto lens, and a 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle lens. The front-facing camera is a 16-megapixel sensor. The device comes with up to 1TB of internal storage and 16GB of RAM, and connectivity options include Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, Bluetooth 5.4, GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS, NFC, and USB Type-C 2.0. The iQOO 12 Pro is equipped with a 5100mAh battery that supports 120W wired charging, 50W wireless charging, and 10W reverse wireless charging. The device is available in black, red, and white, with a price of approximately €650.

generated.out: The Emporia Elegance is a feature phone that boasts a sleek and compact design, measuring 109 x 50 x 14 mm and weighing just 92 grams. It runs on the Infineon PMB7880 chipset and features a 1.8-inch TFT display with a resolution of 128 x 160 pixels. The phone does not have a camera, but it does come with a built-in flashlight. Communication options include GSM support on 900/1800 MHz bands, Bluetooth 2.0, and FM radio. The Emporia Elegance has a 1100 mAh removable Li-Ion battery with a standby time of up to 300 hours and a talk time of up to 4 hours. The phone is available in black, white, and brown color options.

generated.out: The XOLO Era is a smartphone that runs on Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) and is powered by a Spreadtrum 7731 chipset with a quad-core 1.2 GHz CPU and Mali-400 GPU. It features a 5.0-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels, resulting in a screen-to-body ratio of approximately 65.8%. The device comes with 8GB of internal storage and 1GB of RAM, which can be expanded via a microSDHC card. The primary camera is an 8-megapixel sensor with LED flash, panorama, and HDR capabilities, while the secondary camera is a 2-megapixel sensor. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and FM radio, and the device is equipped with a 3.5mm headphone jack and a microUSB 2.0 port. The Era is dual SIM compatible and is available in black. The device is powered by a removable Li-Ion 2100 mAh battery, which provides up to 24 hours of talk time on 2G and up to 10 hours on 3G. The XOLO Era was announced in July 2015 and was released around the same time. It is now discontinued.
